bool CWebPage::DownloadFile (  const string &  sFileUrl,
const string &  sSaveToFile,
bool  bOverwrite = false
) 
 

Downloads an internet based file to a local destination.

Parameters:
sFileUrl Complete URL of the file.
sSaveToFile The destination of the file. Must point to a valid directory or the function will fail.
bOverwrite Boolean value specifying whether already existing file at the destination should be overwritten or not.
Returns:
A boolean value based on success.

bool CWebPage::DownloadWebPage (  const string &  sUrl  ) 
 

Downloads the source code of a web page.

The downloaded contents can be retrieved using GetContents().

Parameters:
sUrl Complete URL to the web page.
Returns:
A boolean value based on success.

string CWebPage::GetContents (   )  [inline]
 

Get the web page source downloaded last.

Returns:
String containing web page source.

Get the last status message.
